thread.title: Tamannaah Bhatia and Kajal Aggarwal Were Fashion BFFs in Amit Aggarwal At Lakme Fashion Week, Day 1
thread.title_full: Tamannaah Bhatia and Kajal Aggarwal Were Fashion BFFs in Amit Aggarwal At Lakme Fashion Week, Day 1

title: Tamannaah Bhatia and Kajal Aggarwal Were Fashion BFFs in Amit Aggarwal At Lakme Fashion Week, Day 1
text:
facebook 492 SHARES 
Ok, we are going to go out on a limb and say that BFF-ing at Fashion Week is the new street style. We all know celebrities love to pose. But they love posing arm-in-arm in a pair even more. Just look at these Bollywood beauties looking sensational in two really cool Amit Aggarwal ensembles. Tamannaah wore (what-we-would-like-to-call) a modified LBD with a metallic flared hemline, red lips, strappy heels and tousled hair. Fashion darling and actress, Kajal-who wore an AM.IT by Amit Aggarwal top with skinny pants and strappy heels-went for a more dressed-down version. We love it ALL. A photo posted by Tamannaah Bhatia (@tamannaahspeaks) on Feb 1, 2017 at 9:08am PST
